activity.description: Graphical story constructor with a variety of characters and backgrounds and simple word-processing capabilities
Animate a cartoon character by creating a sequence of poses inside a filmstrip
Using keyframes, program a stick figure to twist, turn, tumble and dance
Start a multimedia jokebook and invite your friends to add jokes to it via the mesh
Play the ancient game of Go either locally or across two XO's
Construct and maintain your own city
Slider Puzzle to improve on puzzle solving skills
An animated face that speaks whatever you type
A GUI for installing and removing activities
Create a poll, collect votes and analyze community opinions
Cartoons to explain Creative Commons licensing and provide a license chooser
Sponsored video editor allowing children to construct video dialogs with short video clips, for constructivist language-learning
The ePals activity allows teachers and students to communicate with the ePals Global Community of learners from around the world
